author: boudoul
body:
Greetings 
This pull request aim for 
- Describing the final Tracker for the TDR (in D11) described here : 
http://ghugo.web.cern.ch/ghugo/layouts/2016/OT613_200_IT4025/


- Fix the important thing which was a (non desired and problematic) dependencies of the phase2 Geometry with Phase1 Geometry (for the inner pixel part ) 
--> the Inner Tracker is now defined as P2PXBBarrel and no more as P1PXBBarrel which could cause severe bugs for any changes in 2017 geometry 

- The usage of  P1PXBBarrel eleswhere in cmssw has been tracked down and fixed accordingly 

- Note that the D11 is no more running the track trigger sequence, as it should be fix ot deal with the new geometries (new rings) to be fix in a subsequent PR 

- I have added a protection in the phase2 DQM in case of no valid collections are found 

- PLease note that this PR (in particular D11 sceanrio ) should be tested with this PR :+1: https://github.com/cms-data/SLHCUpgradeSimulations-Geometry/pull/6
title: Final Tracker Geometry for tracker TDR + Cleaning old Phase1
